translated: The hell was fifteen yojanas long and wide, surrounded by iron walls and covered with an iron net above. In the four corners of the city, violent fires and winds came blowing on the iron mountains, the mountains grinding against each other to form sharp swords. The swords were double-edged, also like razor blades. In the empty space, there were also sounds like thunder. The swords came down from the sky, piercing the sinners' heads. Entering from the head, they came out from the soles of the feet. Entering from the back, they came out from the chest. Coming out from the left, they entered from the right. Smoke and fire burned together. In a single day and night, the sinner experienced ten thousand kinds of suffering. Dying a thousand times and being reborn a thousand times, dying ten thousand times and being reborn ten thousand times, if he managed to be reborn as a human, he would have evil sores all over his body.

translated: The hell is fifteen yojanas long and wide, surrounded by iron walls and covered with an iron net above. In the four corners of the city, fierce fires and winds blow, striking the iron mountains, which grind against each other and form sharp swords. The blades of the swords are also like razor blades. In the empty space, there are sounds like thunder. The swords strike each other like lightning, coming down from the sky to pierce the heads of the sinners. If they are reborn as humans, they will have evil sores all over their bodies.
